marsbars

Class TemperatureModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • marsbars.TemperatureModel

  • public class TemperatureModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model responsible for calculations that are required for the temperature sensor and furnace and air conditioner control.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double ABSOLUTEZERO 
      static double TOASTY

      double getCurrentTemp()
      Returns the current temperature of the environment as picked up by the temperature sensor
      java.lang.String getDeviceStatus()
      Returns whether or not the furnace or air conditioner has been turned on or off by the sensor system Note: Both devices cannot be on at the same time.
      void sensor()
      This is the sensor method to check the temperature level of the greenhouse and update the temperature level according to the rate of change that the user has specified.

    • Method Detail

      • setTemperatureRange

        public void setTemperatureRange(double tempUpper,
                                double tempLower)
        Sets the user desired upper and lower range of temperature for the sensor to maintain
        Parameters:
        tempUpper - The maximum temperature level of the desired temperature range
        tempLower - The minimum temperature level of the desired temperature range

      • setCurrentTemperature

        public void setCurrentTemperature(double currTemp)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current temperature level of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        currTemp - Temperature of the greenhouse to set to
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - A custom error that prompts the user if desired humdity is beyond the threshold range.

      • setInternalCoolRate

        public void setInternalCoolRate(double rate)
        Set the current rate at which the furnace raises the temperature of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        rate - Rate of increase in temperature (C/min)

      • setInternalHeatRate

        public void setInternalHeatRate(double rate)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Set the current rate at which the air conditioner lowers the temperature of the greenhouse
        Parameters:
        rate - Rate of decrease in temperature (C/min)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Prompt the user that temperature rate of change can only be positive because this is a one way device

      • getCurrentTemp

        public double getCurrentTemp()
        Returns the current temperature of the environment as picked up by the temperature sensor
        Returns:
        currentTemp Current greenhouse temperature level

      • getDeviceStatus

        public java.lang.String getDeviceStatus()
        Returns whether or not the furnace or air conditioner has been turned on or off by the sensor system Note: Both devices cannot be on at the same time.
        Returns:
        A message to display on the GUI (Heating/Cooling/Off)

      • sensor

        public void sensor()
        This is the sensor method to check the temperature level of the greenhouse and update the temperature level according to the rate of change that the user has specified. It also controls the furnace and air conditioner in order to increase or decrease the temperature level to the desired range specified by the user.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a well formated data string so that it can be stored into a simulation save file for retrieval
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
